is a village in the Province of
. It has a population of 3,000 people. It's one of the smallest villages in Baix Llobregat.

The weather changes each season. In the summer the weather is hot, in the winter it is cold, in the spring and the autumn the weather is usually sunny although it is sometimes cloudy and foggy. 

This village isn't very famous but it's a great village. The people are friendly and helpful.

The best things about La Palma are the people and the atmosphere. It's quite and small. It's perfect place if you want relax and if you want to have a nice time.
It's a small village but it's very beautiful! It's fantastic for walking around.
There are restaurants, parks and some shops. On Thursday there is a small market where you can buy fruit and vegetables, or clothes.

value: There are mountains around the village and there is a river. You can go for a ride on motorbike or on horse. It's very relaxing! There are a lot of tracks around the village.
In August there is a Festival, “Festa Major”, you can enjoy it a lot because there are concerts, markets... the people are very happy because they love having a good time in this Festival.
In the summer and the spring, you can go for a walk, or for a drink , and there are more people on the streets. You can go to the beach because it's very close by car or by bus.
